benchmark.name: tde
benchmark.description: This is the Time Delay Equalization phase from the GMTI application using the "Samll" input dataset. The tde.str version performs a 12-way data-parallel version of the algorithm (just a convolution), imitating the way that the C code from this phase in GMTI would be compiled by RStream and parallelized. The tde_pp.str version is coded in a style more natural to StreamIt using pipeline parallelism. There is some data-parallelism available by setting parameters in tde_pp.str, which allows us to increase the number of filters for use in performance studies. tde.str makes no pretense at ordering the output data in a canonical way: it is expected to connect with another GMTI phase that has been parallelized in such a way as to accept its data. tde_pp.str canonicalizes the order of the output data.

impl.desc: The data-parallel versin of tde described above.
The pipeline-parallel version of tde described above.
